name: Fairy Quest (Fantastic Systems)
description:
A fairy is returned home from vacation and goes around fixing up things for the various characters in her realm, but ends up having to save the whole world from a cosmic horror.  It's meant to be funny, silly and snarky and a bit reminiscent of the Sierra style games from the 80's and 90's, though how successful the attempt can be debated.  The quests are really simple but can sometimes be quite challenging due mostly to my poor programming skills.  Enjoy a fun little adventure in Faerealm and don't mess with the Fae, if/unless you know what's good for you.

Note From Developer: This game is still very much in development and may be more annoying than fun.  Donations will go directly to improve the game, and please do feel free to send bug reports if you are so inclined (you will find many bugs).
